subject: Import & customs
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I hope you are well.

I am interested in the plus x pedals but I am concerned about import and customs charges.

I note at checkout it says taxes included but just wanted to check as I am based in the uk, can you advise if these would still be applicable?

Kind regards,

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Butler,       I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. There will be no customs duties on shipments to the UK, so please don't worry.
